name: The World's Biggest Wordsearch Puzzle
blurb: The World\u2019s Biggest Wordsearch Puzzle - a richly featured game, a massive poster and an opportunity to be part of a World Record.

rewards.reward: Approx $1.60.  Puzzle Star: You've got us on our way and for that we're very grateful!

Approx $8. Immortality: we\u2019ll put your name (max 13 characters) in this World Record Beating Puzzle and ALL versions of the game.  You\u2019ll forever be immortalized as a contributor to a World Record.  We\u2019ll also send you a PDF of the finished puzzle poster and we\u2019ll tell you when the iOS and Android versions go live so you can download and play those too.  Play the game, find your name, tell your friends about your awesome World Record.
Approx $16.  PC Puzzler: Receive a digital copy of the PC version of the game. \r\nWe\u2019ll also email you when the iOS and Android versions go live so you can download and play those too.

Approx $24. PC Puzzler Plus: Receive a digital copy of the PC version of the game PLUS a digital copy of the Original Sound Track PLUS a PDF of the puzzle poster. We\u2019ll also email you when the iOS and Android versions go live so you can download and play those too.

Approx $32.  Poster Puzzler: Receive a massive A0 poster of the puzzle and a digital copy of the PC version of the game. \r\nWe\u2019ll also email you when the iOS and Android versions go live so you can download and play those too.

Approx $32. EARLY BIRD Record Breaker: Send us your name and we'll incorporate it into the puzzle - you'll be a joint World Record Holder! Once that's done, you can find yourself on the massive A0 poster of the puzzle and the digital copy of the PC version of the game we send you. We\u2019ll also email you when the iOS and Android versions go live so you can download and play those too. Limited run at a low price!

Approx $48.  Record Breaker: Send us your name and we'll incorporate it into the puzzle - you'll be a joint World Record Holder!  Once that's done, you can find yourself on the massive A0 poster of the puzzle and the digital copy of the PC version of the game we send you. \r\nWe\u2019ll also email you when the iOS and Android versions go live so you can download and play those too.

Approx $80.  Celebration: Receive 2 copies of the regular poster plus a single copy of a Special Limited Edition ‘Celebration’ print of the poster (only 400 will ever be made), signed by the puzzle.tv compilers.
PLUS - send us 3 names and we'll incorporate them into the puzzle - you and 2 of your friends / family can be joint World Record Holders!
You will of course be fully credited in game and on the poster.
You’ll also receive a digital copy of the PC version of the game and we’ll email you when the iOS and Android versions go live so you can download and play those too.

Approx $80. Puzzle Maker: We\u2019ve set aside an area of the grid for you to make your own themed section. Come up with a theme, and provide up to 20 words and we\u2019ll incorporate them into the grid. We\u2019ll help and advise on word choice. You also get to choose the title of this area of the grid. Note that as all words in the puzzle have to be unique we may have to ask you to choose some alternatives. No swear words and nothing defamatory please! We reserve the right to veto any choices, but we\u2019ll work hard to ensure your choices are as you want them. At your option, we\u2019ll also include your photo next to your name in the credits section of the puzzle.\r\n\r\nOnce that's done, you can find yourself on the massive A0 poster of the puzzle and the digital copy of the PC version of the game we send you. We\u2019ll also email you when the iOS and Android versions go live so you can download and play those too.

Approx. $160.  Big Pack: Receive 10 copies of the A0 poster of the puzzle to share with your friends and family plus 10 digital copies of the PC version of the game.

PLUS - send us 8 names and we'll incorporate them into the puzzle - you and your friends / family can be joint World Record Holders!
You will of course be fully credited in game and on the poster.
We’ll also email you when the iOS and Android versions go live so you can download and play those too.

Approx $480. Corner Controller: New lower price!  Same deal as with 'Puzzle Maker', but you get to set the theme for one of the corners of the puzzle - the most regularly solved sections of the whole grid. Come up with a theme, and provide up to 20 words and we\u2019ll incorporate them into the grid. We\u2019ll help and advise on word choice. You also get to choose the title of this area of the grid. Note that as all words in the puzzle have to be unique we may have to ask you to choose some alternatives. No swear words and nothing defamatory please! We reserve the right to veto any choices, but we\u2019ll work hard to ensure your choices are as you want them. At your option, we\u2019ll also include your photo next to your name in the credits section of the puzzle. Also included are 10 copies of the poster and 10 copies of the PC version.
